mapper.insert: insert into gateway_log (req_id, order_id, accout_id, app_id, service_id, account_req_time, req_time, rsp_time, err_code, err_msg) values (#{reqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountReqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gateway_log set accout_id = #{accoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_req_time = #{accountReqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, req_time = #{reqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rsp_time = #{rspTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, err_code = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, err_msg = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where req_id = #{reqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select req_id, order_id, accout_id, app_id, service_id, account_req_time, req_time, rsp_time, err_code, err_msg from gateway_log
